channel.title: Random spawn points?

item.title: Random spawn points?
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

is it posible… for when players log in. or even die, can i apply misc.random to that and have random tele spots?

if(misc.random(2) == 1) {
teleportToX = #;
teleportToY = #;
} else {
teleportToX = #;
teleportToY = #;
}

hmm? if so… can i apply it to the start point?

Read full topic
